remarks: A faithful functor reflects monomorphisms.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fthmon.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
fthmon.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
fthmon.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( C Faith D ) G ) $.
fthmon.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
fthmon.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
fthmon.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( X H Y ) ) $.
fthmon.m $e |- M = ( Mono ` C ) $.
fthmon.n $e |- N = ( Mono ` D ) $.
fthmon.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( X G Y ) ` R ) e. ( ( F ` X ) N ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
fthmon $p |- ( ph -> R e. ( X M Y ) ) $.
